title: PES FEES 2024
content: Hey does anyone know 4 year btech fee for PESU? How much is the fee hike compared to last year? Im an aspirant btw

comments.body:
All this information is on the PES website: https://pes.edu/fee-details/

Why not learn to Google next time?
You could've been nicer... I've seen this but I don't know if it includes all miscellaneous costs like hostel stay and stuff

Well then maybe ask what you're actually trying to get an answer to. Tuition fee was discussed on this sub just 2 weeks ago - if you had searched this sub you would have found it too. Also, the website clearly indicates the amounts mentioned to be for tuition.

This sub encourages good questions, ones which usually cannot be found by visiting the uni website or by searching this sub. Duplicate/Redundant posts are an inconvenience to everyone. I could've been nicer, but you could have also been precise.
